title: Bachelors of Graphic Arts
description: Successfully completed an intensive graphic design program, mastering key design principles and industry-standard software tools. Proficient in color theory, typography, and visual communication through practical projects. Skilled in problem-solving through real-world design challenges. Equipped with a strong foundation to apply creative expertise in the field. Ready to contribute effectively to graphic design projects.

title: Graphic Designer
description: Developed a strong foundation in design principles and proficiently mastered industry-standard software tools. Acquired hands-on experience in color theory, typography, and visual communication through a series of portfolio-enhancing projects. Gained valuable problem-solving skills by tackling real-world design challenges. Ready to apply newfound knowledge and passion for design to contribute effectively in the field.

title: FullStack Developer
description: Embark on a comprehensive journey to become a versatile Fullstack Developer. Learn front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for dynamic web interfaces. Master server-side programming with languages such as Python or Node.js, and explore database management. Acquire hands-on experience in building complete web applications from scratch. Gain the skills to excel in both front-end and back-end development roles.
